item.title: What is XSS?
item.description: Vulnerable page <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <body> <p id="entry">Hello</p> <script> function Done(event) { document.getElementById('entry').innerHTML = event.target.given.value; event.preventDefault(); } </script> <form onsubmit="Done(event)"> Enter: <input type="text" id="given" /> <input type="submit" value="Submit" /> </form> </body> </html>
